interests.CanAdd: If you still can't find what you're looking for, you can add a new interest below:
interests.TrySynonyms: Don't see it? Try some synonyms.

chat.flaggedForAdminReview: Message has been flagged for admin review. Tap again to unflag.
chat.closeChatConfirm: Are you sure you want to close this chat?
chat.notAllowedToJoinCall: You don't have permission to join this conversation.

dialog.photoInstruction: If the person who scanned your QR code is in front of you, take a photo of them
dialog.title: Invite

sms.content: You have been invited to {{title}}. Please tap {{url}}

notice.text: You have been invited. {{ClickOrTap}} here to accept and join.

mobile.alert: Invites are sent from our number, which your friends don't yet recognize. Follow up with a quick text to let them know the invitation came from you, asking them to click the link.
mobile.confirm: Invites are sent from our number, which your friends don't yet recognize. Would you like to follow up with a quick text to let them know the invitation came from you, asking them to click the link.
mobile.check: Hey, I just sent you an invite to the {{app}} app. Please check your sms and click the link!

email.alert: Invites are sent from our domain, which your friends don't yet recognize. Follow up with a quick text to let them know the invitation came from you, asking them to click the link.
email.confirm: Invites are sent from our domain, which your friends don't yet recognize. Would you like to follow up with a quick text to let them know the invitation came from you, asking them to click the link.
email.subject: Did you get an invite?
email.body: Hey, I just sent you an invite to the {{app}} app. Please check your email and click the link in there!
